City Council
============

Overton City Council meets monthly on the 3rd Thursday of each month, 7:00 P.M., at City Hall.  The meetings are open to the public, and input is welcomed.

The council members are elected in November for a 2 (two) year term, all positions are at large.  To email the Mayor or any Council Member, please use the following email addresses:

**COUNCIL PLACE                                                                                                                               EMAIL**

Mayor
[Curtis Gilbert](mailto:mayor@cityofoverton.com)
[mayor@cityofoverton.com](mailto:mayor@cityofoverton.com)

[council1@cityofoverton.com](mailto:council1@cityofoverton.com)

[council2@cityofoverton.com](mailto:council2@cityofoverton.com)
